pros: Excellent stability shoe; Good lacing; Looks the part; Comfortable; Consistent ride in any condition; Good grip; Perfect daily runner
cons: Runs half a size small; Heel counter is not for everyone; Quite heavy
RR_verdict: With this iteration, I proved that the NB 860 series continues to provide amazing support for flat feet and overpronation. Ever improving, I loved that the v12 has brought some new technology into this shoe while bringing back some of the features of the old upper.
awards: Top pick in best New Balance running shoes (2023)
use: Jogging |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
